challenge.title: Discrete Mathematics With Applications - Susanna Epp - Chapter 3
challenge.description: Susanna Epp's Discrete Mathematics With Applications is an introduction to discrete mathematics.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Susanna Epp's Discrete Mathematics With Applications, Chapter Three, and finish questions with solutions (there is a solution manual on Archive.org).
